page.title: 05GALA WEEK IN LITTLEMILL
page.content: Every year our district holds a Gala Week.This year it starts on Sunday 9th June.All the people in the village decorate their house with flags made out of cloth or coloured polythene bags.The Gala Queen is chosen by lot from all the girls who are 12 years old or over and live in the surrounding area.This year our Gala Queen is Shawn McIndoe who lives on a local farm.As well as a queen we have two attendants and a page boy.They too are chosen by lot.It is unusual for the attendants to be in the same family but this year it has happened.Jo-Ann,Jardene and Jamie Ferguson are this year's attendants.Usually our Gala Week starts on a Monday,but this year we are having a Fun Run on Sunday to help raise funds for the Gala Week.
